channel.title: www on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in www on Chege's Blog

item.title: Privacy on the Web
item.description: One can use curl -v <url> to see all of the redirections and cookies set. found that generating a tiny URL for Zoom links gives a URL that first goes to redirect.viglink.com. I tried this on https://tinyurl.com/yyte6pqv, which points to https://www.c13u.com/socioeconomics/2020-11-21-experiments-in-social-economics/, but didn’t observe any 3rd party cookies. tinyurl.com did set a cookie, but that’s probably expected. proposes Federated Learning of Cohorts, which aims to enable ad-targeting based on people’s general browsing interest without exposing the exact browsing history.

item.title: The World Wide Web
item.description: Not sure where web researchers congregate. The HT Conference doesn’t have that much content, and the WWW Conference covers way more than just the web. Maybe going through Google Scholar will provide an intuition for where to catch current/influential research on the nature of the web.
